edu.ou.asgbook.gmm.GaussianMixtureModel Class Reference

Detailed Description

A parametric approximation of a spatial grid as a sum of Gaussians.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

static void edu.ou.asgbook.gmm.GaussianMixtureModel.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00155                                                             {
00156         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00157 
00158         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("gmmpopdensity");
00159         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "original", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00160                 
00161         GaussianMixtureModel gmm = new GaussianMixtureModel(popdensity, 10);
00162         GaussianComponent[] fit = gmm.getMixture();
00163         List<LatLon> locs = new ArrayList<LatLon>();
00164         List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>();
00165         for (int i=0; i < fit.length; ++i){
00166             LatLon loc = popdensity.getLocation( fit[i].getCx(), fit[i].getCy() );
00167             String name = ("GMM#" + i + " ampl=" +  fit[i].getWeight() + " sigmax=" + fit[i].getSigmax() + " sigmay=" + fit[i].getSigmay());            
00168             System.out.println(" loc: " + loc + name);
00169             locs.add(loc);
00170             names.add(name);
00171         }       
00172         KmlWriter.write(locs, names, out, "gmmcities");
00173         
00174         // write out the approximation
00175         gmm.setValueInGrid(popdensity, 500);
00176         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "gmmapprox", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00177     }

void edu.ou.asgbook.gmm.GaussianMixtureModel.setValueInGrid ( LatLonGrid  data,
double  scale 
)

Estimates the value at each pixel in the grid based on GMM The values will be 0-1, so provide a scale in order to make them integers.

Parameters:
data 
00046                                                              {
00047         data.setMissing(0);
00048         double peakval = 0;
00049         for (int m=0; m < mixture.size(); ++m){
00050             peakval = Math.max( peakval, mixture.get(m).getWeight() );
00051         }
00052         for (int i=0; i < data.getNumLat(); ++i){
00053             for (int j=0; j < data.getNumLon(); ++j){
00054                 double raw = 0;
00055                 for (int m=0; m < mixture.size(); ++m){
00056                     raw += mixture.get(m).computeProbabilityDensityAt(i,j);
00057                 }
00058                 data.setValue(i,j, (int) Math.round(raw*scale/peakval));
00059             }
00060         }
00061     }
